body_content.explanation: something strange or not known that has not yet been explained or understood:
examples: How the massive stones were brought here from hundreds of miles away is/remains a mystery.
The mystery was solved when the police discovered the murder weapon.
The book tries to explain some of the mysteries of life.
The details of the scandal remain cloaked/shrouded/wrapped in mystery.
It's a complete mystery (to me) that/why (= I do not understand why) she married him at all!

body_content.explanation: a book, film, or play, especially about a crime or a murder, with a surprise ending that explains all the strange events that have happened:
